author: Peggy Rowe
content: Charley and Maurine were class act. I was honored to host them at my home twice. He spoke of my Ted and he being like kids in a sand box designing sailboats. RIP to Charlie and Maurine.

author: Henry Ubik
content:
I was a owner of a Heritage racing boat built by his company. I ended up selling the boat because of a job change but kept in touch with Charlie over the years.
He was a great person, that once you met him, he made you feel like you knew him all your life.
May he & his wife rest in peace.
